text:
e="preserve">John Henry Matthew Reilly (November 11, 1936 – January 9, 2021) was an American actor. He appeared on soap operas including "General Hospital", "Sunset Beach", and "Passions". Reilly was born in Chicago. His career lasted from 1965 until 2013.
Reilly died on January 9, 2021 at the age of 84.
